thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com | 8 of 1380
thread.title: Satisified Customer

author: Satisified Customer
title: Satisified Customer
text: I originally came to the PureFormulas website because I was unable to purchase magnesium malate in capsule form at my local vitamin supplier. I was very pleased with how easy it was to order the product. It was more convenient to order online than go to the store - great selection, ease of site use and email followup by the "Customer Happiness Team" (nice touch with the name!). I will be using PureFormulas for future purchases.
